text: Yesli by Allakh v otvet lyudyam pospeshil prichinit' im zlo, kak speshat oni poluchit' dobro, to unichtozhil by ikh vsekh do yedinogo. No Allakh, okazyvaya milost' lyudyam, ne uskoryayet ikh gibel', ozhidaya, chto oni budut tvorit' soobrazno tomu, chto On znayet o nikh. Eto svidetel'stvuyet o spravedlivosti nakazaniya nevernykh, kotorym dana otsrochka, a oni, vopreki nastavleniyam i zapovedyam Allakha, narochno otklonyayutsya ot pryamogo puti i idut po puti zabluzhdeniya i mraka
